item.title: Decluttering our visualizations
item.description: Once again I had the pleasure to talk about data visualization, thanks to the Power Platform Euskadi group. This time it has been in the Global Power Platform Bootcamp 2023 where I have been able to talk about techniques to remove noise from our visualizations, using Power BI. Below you will find links to the datasources, visualizations and presentation used during the talk and, in the future, I will put a link to the video of the presentation.

item.title: Power BI: Gimme more visualizations!
item.description: Within the Power BI Days Bilbao and the Power BI Virtual Conf 23, I had the pleasure to deliver the following content. In the world of data visualization, simplicity is synonymous with success. But sometimes we want to go a little further and experiment with new visual models. Power BI offers by default a lot of options with which we will cover most of our needs, but there is a MarketPlace with endless options to create different visualizations.

item.title: Data Storytelling with Power BI
item.description: There are many tools for creating data visualizations, but one of the most common used and powerful is Power BI.

item.title: Data Visualization with Power BI
item.description: We live in the era of data. We are surrounded by data. There are tons of tools, methodologies, software, processes, etc. to extract, transform and load from just a couple or records to even tens of millions of records. But what about after all that? How can we make so much data usable?
